data.description: #Adds #PvE This thing is nuts. Subsistence and Frenzy are the perfect combo here, but the new focus fire perk is good as well. Do pair this with Void 3.0 volatile rounds or other void subclass things. Adrenaline Junkie is another damage option if you are running nade-nation.
data.name: PvE God Tier

data.description: Explosive is great. Fury is ok. Headstone if you need stasis synergy. #Adds #Boss
data.name: PvE

data.description: Grenade-pa-looza. Pairs with Ogma to have two slots with grenade-nation.
data.name: nader fever

data.description: This is my personal roll. You may not care but grenade land Hoooo!
data.name: Grenade God Roll

data.description: Really want Successful Warmup here with firmly planted, charge rate and range stability. Master work stability or charge time is fine with me. Firmly planted/Successful Warm-up Or high impact instead of warm up is good too. For PvP though meta is rapid fire for CQC so craft your own Likely Suspect. This thing is for out-ranging. It's a one-trick pony. Use it till you die.
data.name: Ranged killer

data.description: You only want reservoir burst or High impact with compulsive reload. If you don't care about reservoir burst, maybe because you have a Null Composure already, try for a different rapid-fire fusion that can have vorpal-like cartesian coordinate.
data.name: Ranged PvE

data.description: This is the god roll. Max DPS for bosses. This is the best perk for boss dps. Max damage and we can't craft it... #PvE #Boss
data.name: PvE Godroll

data.description: Good roll here for PvE. Adds you want chain reaction, boss timed payload or explosive light. Frenzy is for both but not as good in either situation.
data.name: PvE Good

data.description: Reloading is not needed with both triple tap and fourth times the charm if you hit your precisions.
data.name: PvE Godroll

data.description: Triple Tap with any damage perk is good here. For god roll fourth times the charm is hyped up but this will get most damage per shot. One for all/Frenzy never fails. Vorpal for bosses only and rampage is easy procing after kills with decent timer. For more damage One for all or frenzy.
data.name: PvE Strong

data.description: Not crazy for PvP, but if you like the looks, zen moment/dynamic sway will be pin point as it gets. Range or stability the rest of the way.
data.name: PvP Ok

data.description: Replace your non-adept with this. This god roll is forth times the charm with triple tap
data.name: Strong PvE

data.description: Snapshot opening shot. Done and done. For a better pvp sniper you might want to try getting a fugue or crafting a sniper with underpressue/opening shot.
data.name: PvP

data.description: You want this triple tap and firing line for PvE. Great option.
data.name: PvE Great

data.description: Really Threat detector and opening shot/moving target here is the god roll but other great perks too.
data.name: Great Slug PvP

data.description: God roll here is subsistence or lead from gold with Frenzy.
data.name: PvE DPS

data.description: Get highest range possible with perks and masterwork as reload or range/handling
data.name: PvE God

data.description: Snapshot opening shot, good as it gets on this. Even with hard to get, Fugue is just as good and the craftable sniper is better.
data.name: Decent PvP

data.description: Huge perk pool...but some decent ones. Subsistence and one for all is great for PvE. The new focused fury synergizes just as well if you don't need the damage. Any damage last column is good.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Good Roll here. Check for potential God rolls of: 1) Outlaw/Kill Clip 2) Rapid Hit/Range Finder 3) Rapid Hit/Opening Shot. If you need to get even more picky, Arrowhead Brake is best barrel and Richochet Rounds is best rounds for it. Range Masterwork.
data.name: PvP Roll

data.description: This origin trait is awesome. PvE Amazing. Subsistence and Focused Fury/One For All. That's what you really want but overflow is a good subsistence replacement. Both do amazing but one for all damage is easier to get than focus fury, and you get the damage earlier in the mag.
data.name: PvE Potential God roll

data.description: Currently the best handcannon. Better than palindrome, etc. Suros synergy origin trait plays a lot here. Take your pick but eye of the storm/Heating Up and opening shot/range finder are probably slightly the best. Most agree Eye of the Storm and Rangefinder are the godroll with masterwork range for max range. Masterwork Range.
data.name: PvP Godroll Alert potential

data.description: Adaptive munitions and disruption break. This is great and high end content to shred shields. Any damage perk is good but this is a unique gun that can get both shield perks together.
data.name: PvE High End Content

data.description: Good legendary PvP Sniper. Hard to get a good roll but ideally no distractions with snapshot sights, or moving target/Box Breathing if you don't need snapshot. Again Suros perk is great here to reduce flinch. Zoom on this is a bit high but if you can deal its great.
data.name: PvP A Tier

data.description: Fourth times the charm firing line is basic great. Any other damage perk is good. Auto loading is ok for quick swaps.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Veist origin in PvE again is great. Side arms are ok. Best PvE Sidearm if you like.
data.name: PvE

data.description: If you have to take a sidearm in PvP this is not bad. Won't beat exotic Forerunner, but as far as legendary goes, only thing that beats this is Peacebond but the roll for that is hard to get.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Rapid hit and kill clip is the most sought after. Its a 180 rpm though...so not as hard hitting. If you want adagio can make it a 140 if you get one kill. Worth trying out for the iron wolf perk in iron banner to get stealth radar.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Add clear monster with chain reaction on a spin cycle of death. Not going to out dps bosses like guillotine though.
data.name: PvE Vortex Frame

data.description: If you need a sword in PvP, other than eager edge on 30th anniversary swords, this in iron banner can make you stealthy for the close kills
data.name: PvP Ok

data.description: Solo content gun! The last member of your fireteam origin perk triggers for solo content. Triple tap and forth times the charm are good for this but damage perks are good in place of forth times the charm like vorpal or focused fire.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Solo weapon upgrade to adept. Triple tap and fourth times the charm again is the no reload desired roll. Its nothing bad if you get a damage perk instead of fourth times the charm though.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Fourth-column is what matters here. For bosses or adds explosive light, frenzy, or one for all in that order. For Adds adrenaline junkie can also work with nade-nation. Chill clip for utility. Pick your favorite third-column perk. I like impulse for speed which increases DPS. #PvE #Adds
data.name: PvE Nade launcher Decent

data.description: Reloading is not needed with both triple tap and fourth times the charm if you hit your precisions.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Fourth-column is what matters here. For bosses explosive light, frenzy, or one for all in that order. For Adds adrenaline junkie can also work with nade-nation. Chill clip for utility. Pick your favorite third-column perk. I like impulse for speed which increases DPS. #PvE #Boss
data.name: PvE Boss Decent

data.description: Nade Nation #PvE #NadeNation I like spamming grenades. For any boss or adds, a grenade build would love this with another similar energy/kinetic for one size fits all nade spamming with void 3.0 volatile grenades.
data.name: Nade Nation

data.description: This is a Gambit weapon, for Gambit. Invader tracker is great for the "Sentry" role of your team. You can pick any damage perk in the last column but frenzy or moving target are great for the damage consistency and moving target for the utility of headshots. Range as high as possible. The third column is best spent getting stability as high as possible to keep on target. #PvP #PvE #Gambit
data.name: PvP Roll

data.description: Rapid Fire frames are in for PvP now. This perk pool can outgun messengers. Best Pulse for PvP. Better yet, its craftable. If you got this great! But you'll want to unlock the crafting later to fine-tune your needs. Recoil is something you really want to be controlled on this. Arrowhead brake all the way. rounds should be best range, and heating up in the perfect third column but the perpetual motion is second best. Moving target to keep sticky headshots and for your mod, put on the counter balance stock if you didn't get the 85-90 recoil direction otherwise your choice of Icarus for jumping or sprint grip for run n' gun.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Decent PvE Choice with any damage perk and overflow or stats for all dependin on your personal preference.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Best ranged fusion for PvP in the rapid fire category. Amazing potential. You can craft your barrel and charge rate later, but if you don't have the pattern unlocked, just firmly planted and successful warm-up. All day. #PvP #GodTier
data.name: PvP

data.description: As close as a bow can get to a machine gun so far. Great add clear potential with rapid fire shots, especial for end game content. Craft the others tuff you want later on when you unlock it.
#Adds clear. #PvE great AoE damage here. Either explosive for champions or dragonfly for mini-trinity ghoul that doesn't take up your exotic slot. Later on craft fastest drawtime or accuracy you can.

Triple tap with One For All is your best PvE bet. For champs vorpal is 2nd best, and for adds fury is second best, but more flexible because you can use it for champions too. Craft later when you unlock it.

For bosses lasting impression is the best, with frenzy being second best but best for adds. Adrenaline Junkie is third best here because it requires a grenade to get max stacks without wasting rockets, but nade-nation builds might not care.

Possibly the best PvP SMG out there, at least for a lightweight frame. Multimach and shayura's wrath is still better range. God Rolls: 1) Perpetual Motion/Rangefinder 2) Killing Wind/Frenzy or Adrenaline for more damage but requires setup. Range Masterwork if need to be picky. After that accurized rounds for range, and barrel either full bore or hammer forged. Range is the name of the game.
data.name: PvP Monster

data.description: Eye of the Storm is the S-Tier option but Rangefinder or opening shot decent alternatives in that order. For grip, Heavy for recoil but smooth/polymer are decent backups. Barrel is up to you but range is the desired stat so extended or hammer-forged are best here. Barrel won't break the gun though.
data.name: PvP Desire

data.description: Any Vorpal will be good here. Shuts down supers in crucible. Again barrel is up to you but higher range is great with stability the next focus. Any stock is good with stability of Fitted giving both recoil and stability being the best but the stock really isn't all that important. Not Quite a Godroll though
data.name: PvP Decent

data.description: As far as Rapid Fire frames go, this competes with servant leader with some better PvP Options. You'll want Alacrity for Trials where where you can be the last one standing. Other than that put on one quiet moment. Best option here is tunnel vision/Multi-kill clip, perpetual motion is also decent third slot pick. Last column vorpal or eye of the storm depending on what you need it for though eye of the storm is generally better since rapid fire frames don't crack down super users. If you want that use Dead Man's Tale with Vorpal. For barrels and rounds/mag go for highest range, with stability as the second priority. Masterwork range or Stability depending on other mods.
data.name: PvP Roll

data.description: As far as Rapid Fire frames go, this competes with servant leader with some better PvP Options. You'll want Alacrity for Trials where where you can be the last one standing. Other than that put on one quiet moment. Best option here is tunnel vision/Multi-kill clip, perpetual motion is also decent third slot pick. Last column vorpal or eye of the storm depending on what you need it for though eye of the storm is generally better since rapid fire frames don't crack down super users. If you want that use Dead Man's Tale with Vorpal. For barrels and rounds/mag go for highest range, with stability as the second priority. Masterwork range or Stability depending on other mods.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Great PvP Auto-rifle best in game, except the adept version of course. Especially with Alacrity great for solo play like rumble or trials when people die. For specific Trials/Rumble, Celerity is useful. Other than that rangefinder (shows in both columns) is great. You want rangefinder in third col so fourth can be multi-kill clip or rampage. Wellspring/Harmony in 4th are ok backups with utility. Third col if you don't have rangefinder here, Heating up/Perpetual motion both good, with Moving target next option for aim assist. Any other perks are ok to keep until you get these rolls. For other mods, range and stability in that order, masterwork range/stability, or reload if you like snappy reloads.
data.name: PvP

data.description: ok roll but Krait is going to outshine this thing in current PvE meta. Handy for higher end content if you need the range. Get any damage perk in last column. Dragonfly for adds, focused fury for most easy to get damage boost, with rampage next followed by multi-kill clip
data.name: PvE

data.description: Great PvP Auto-rifle best in game, except the adept version of course. Especially with Alacrity great for solo play like rumble or trials when people die. For specific Trials/Rumble, Celerity is useful. Other than that rangefinder (shows in both columns) is great. You want rangefinder in third col so fourth can be multi-kill clip or rampage. Wellspring/Harmony in 4th are ok backups with utility. Third col if you don't have rangefinder here, Heating up/Perpetual motion both good, with Moving target next option for aim assist. Any other perks are ok to keep until you get these rolls. For other mods, range and stability in that order, masterwork range/stability, or reload if you like snappy reloads. Best PvP auto with the recommended rolls overall.
data.name: PvP

data.description: ok roll but Krait is going to outshine this thing in current PvE meta. Handy for higher end content if you need the range. Get any damage perk in last column. Dragonfly for adds, focused fury for most easy to get damage boost, with rampage next followed by multi-kill clip. Harmony for potential synergy with good specials/Heavy that finish combatants but not optimal. Wellspring for utility builds. In third column overflow is going to be great, but dynamic sway can help keep crits to proc damage from focused fury or get dragonfly procs on crit kills.
data.name: PvE Ok

data.description: Best use would be outlaw kill clip with the most range you can get stability second. Alternatively, blunt execution rounds is a great melee build synergy. Rangefinder is good as well in place of kill clip but kill clip will get you that big damage in team shooting.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Only PvE roll you want here is demolitionist/adrenaline junkie for grenade builds. Other than that no good PvE Perks on this weapon that can outclass any other pulse in the energy slot...
Any damage perk in last column is good, snapshot sights is ok as a backup. This scout is all about range and used in long range maps for it. #PvP

Fourth times the charm or subsistence and one for all is the god roll here, but any damage perk can work. Proc one for all with hits then have fun with nice 5s long damage you can keep refreshing after it expires.

One of the best feeling snipers. PvP only really as there is not a big enough magazine to bring over other snipers in PvE. Depending on what you want, the range is no issue. As a high impact sniper it can also headshot most roaming supers.
data.name: PvP Monster

data.description: The perfect DMT is Vorpal Save this thing. Accurized or high cal is fine, hammer forged is high cal and small bore if accurized.
data.name: Perfect DMT

data.description: This is an instant buy. Can't get a better PvP. Grip here has two options. Smooth for balance, or Polymer for ADS speed. Main perk is Eye of the Storm. Rangefinder isn't the God (best) roll here because if you wanted range, you just pick up Ace of Spades.
data.name: Perfect Hawkmoon

data.description: Perpetual Motion or outlaw/Kill Clip to two tap with team or any other damage boost. For Picky go for more range rounds, High Cal being best. Still need more picky? Range Masterwork. Finally, sights should be Fast draw for best mix of perks but sight is the perfection chaser. Any range masterwork over that sight matters more.
data.name: PvP Great

data.description: This will replace your Vulculpea with Headstone since 140s just dominate 180s for high end content. 180s really only nice for normal playlist with adds but 140s can do work on champs in nightfalls. Any Headstone roll good to synergize with stasis here. Best Range and Stability you can get with scope and barrel. For third column either rapid hit or outlaw up to personal preference, but perpetual motion isn't bad either if you don't have either and keep moving.
data.name: PvE Build

data.description: For PvP this feels really good. Might replace your Scathelocke unless you got a really good roll on that. Vorpal is your only damage option on this and it's not TTK competitive with hand cannons that out-range you, but anything close is getting lit up and fast. Personally I love how it feels
data.name: PvP

data.description: Roll for PvE. Either draw time craziness or synergy with Stasis. Headstone on bows is great.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Solar Synergy with Incandescent. As always more lower draw time to shoot faster increasing DPS. Shoot to loot is utility but archers tempo is the go to here for chaining precisions
data.name: PvE

data.description: Add clear monster with archers tempo and any choice in this third col with dragonfly for adds, or explosive more well rounded. #Adds
data.name: PvE

data.description: Great for Champ stuns and decent at add clear. #Adds #Boss #Champions
data.name: PvE Boss/Champ

data.description: Trials Fusion for PvP.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Adept Version of the trials fusion. Again pvp mostly.
data.name: PvP

data.description: New Kinetic Fusion is PvE amazing. These rolls are keepers. Hang on until you see the god roll alert. Vorpal for Boss DPS, Frenzy in general but cornered is a new perk with good synergy on fusions.
data.name: PvE Boss and Adds

data.description: Good PvP roll. Hangon to for God Alert
data.name: PvP

data.description: Great PvP Fusion to come in IB. Situational last column perk for either chaining or backup plan for well...backup plan.
data.name: PvP

data.description: I like handling for quick swapping with auto-loading holster. If you don't have auto-loading then feeding frenzy to really get going.
data.name: PvE

data.description: D.F.A is a decent PvE Handcannon with the right roll. Your choice on its mostly a boss dps champion stunner but timed payload can push it to adds.
data.name: PvE

data.description: GOD ROLL ALERT! PvP roll could be great, hopefully you are reading this on an Adept gun.
data.name: PvP

data.description: GOD ROLL ALERT! PvP roll could be great, hopefully you are reading this on an Adept gun.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Potential God Roll of your personal choice. Outlaw/Rampage for adds, Triple Tap/Vorpal, Triple Tap/Focused Fury, or new fragile focus if you can stay out of damage long enough.
data.name: PvE

data.description: GOD ROLL ALERT! This is probably the best Arc Linear to date. Boss DPS weapon. Your pick of auto-loading or not, coupled with vorpal or frenzy or firing line. Personal God Roll is clown cartridge with Firing line for Boss DPS.
data.name: PvE God Tier Linear Fusion

data.description: GODROLL ALERT! An upgrade Piece of Mind essentially with a bit more range and stability. Honestly only go for the Adept as the perks aren't much better pvp wise. Kill clip is the draw on this thing for more damage
data.name: PvP

data.description: GODROLL ALERT! An upgrade Piece of Mind essentially with a bit more range and stability. Honestly only go for the Adept as the perks aren't much better pvp wise. Kill clip is the draw on this thing for more damage. Arrowhead brake is the perfect recoil with counter balance stock.
data.name: PvP

data.description: The Messenger's cousin. Its High Impact and fun in PvP. Desperado on this also, but no kill clip. Arrowhead brake on this thing is going to be great for recoil.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Good PvE Pulse if you need to use a pulse. Headstone for stasis but adaptive can scale to end game content.
data.name: PvE

data.description: This is not a PvP Scout sadly. We still lack a solar scout there. However PvE is good. Dragonfly is easy to trigger so spec into that for the mod. Otherwise champions can triple tap/explosive or adaptive for high end content all day. For adds, outlaw/rampage. Incandescent is solar synergy.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Melee Banger. Grave Robber/Swashbuckler. #Adds or One-Two Punch for #Boss if you time your melee build right. #Gambit
data.name: PvE

data.description: Decent Arc PvE rolls. Lots of options for third column, but focused fire paried with one is where its at.
data.name: PvE

data.description: A 15 zoom sniper, this thing screams PvP. Not many great PvE Perks for that reason. Hakke for titan wall busting too. Steady hands for swap speed, tunnel for it being your primary, and encore is an interesting range smg play.
data.name: PvP

data.description: This thing is one zoom away from being top dog on paper. Kill clip and iron reach are competing which is a shame but it'd be OP if they weren't. Either roll is fantastic. More Range is better.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Another Void, High-Impact SMG...ok so Title and Shayura's wasn't enough. This thing is a bit different perk-wise. As always for PvP you want range and this on paper does ok and is more farmable imo then enyo-D. The main draw here is the intrinsic perk to speed up reload on damage, which is always happening.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Also a great roll for PvE, this could easily be used for high end content but frenzy to get the damage more consistently.
data.name: PvE High-End Content

data.description: OH MY. #NadeNation crew rejoice. Its a demo/adrenaline roll. Personally a keeper for me. Won't sit too highly in high end content though. Use for fun factor
data.name: Nade Nation

data.description: In low end content feeding frenzy will put in work for add clear. Your choice of damage boost. #Adds
data.name: General PvE

data.description: #NadeNation rejoice! Another grenader combo fun for PvE shenanigans.
data.name: Nade Nation

data.description: Good PvE Roll for adds and vorpal for boss damage. You'll want Demo/Vorpal, otherwise subsistence for add cleaning and high mag size. Nothing top tier for end game content here. Go for the Adept Version.
data.name: General PvE

data.description: This is a PvP Focus perk pool. This thing has good perks for PvP. That said, its a two burst side arm which takes some getting used to. Multi-Kill clip is good for most options but if used as a backup harmony can get the damage buff on use if you get a kill with something prior and need to clean up close range. Personally only looking for the Adept version here.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Adept PvP version. Keeper for sure. The recoil direction is so good on this thing. If it only had some damage booster to make it broken.
data.name: PvP

data.description: You either want a big mag mod with subsistence for add clear, or a different gun. Vorpal doesn' tmake sense here even with side arm stunning. You'd probably swap weapons to finish them.
data.name: General PvE

data.description: Adept #NadeNation. Fun stuff for general PvE that doesn't scale into high end. Higher mag size is good with the auto-reload of demo.
data.name: Nade Nation

data.description: With the recent sandbox changes in Season of the Haunted 150 Scout rifles become great. This thing won't out shine the exotic Jade Rabbit, but it actually has better handling depending on the roll so could be snappier. The only second column perk you want here is explosive payload to get that flinch and push the range damage further. Opening shot can work if you have a solid barrel and rounds with perpetual or rapid hit. You want to push the handling and stability has high as possible to stay on target. Recommend Stability or Handling Masterwork
data.name: PvP

data.description: Double damage perks. Nuff said. But seriously this thing is a monster in PvP and PvE both. These two perks are the only thing your really care about: Rampage+Kill Clip. Congrats. I'd say a healthy mix of stability and range where possible. Accurized rounds with any range or stability masterwork and barrel
data.name: Monster 150 Scout

data.description: The key here is desperado. That's the main reason people are farming so keep any desperado rolls you get. Desperado is also what makes this great for PvE as well. Don't sleep on that. Personally I'd love to pair it with outlaw or perpetual in that order. High range and check the recoil also. Arrow head brake is good for controlling recoil if you need it. #PvP
data.name: PvP Monster

data.description: Solid PvP Archtype. Rangefinder is sought after on this archtype to give great range. If you play more aggressive kill clip is a good damage perk, but there is definitely synergy to be had here with the demo/adrenaline or grave robber/swash combos. Perpetual/Rangefinder is the perk combo to hunt this season. Masterwork Range.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Sits on par with iron banner smg on paper. PvP focused roll here, with rangefinder being the big money to pump that range out.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Decent pve option but there are better smgs. The main draw here is the new perk puglist. Being able to reset your melee is pretty great. But you can craft an SMG with puglist, and that craftable one has a origin perk that also synergizes with melee, so not too sought for.
data.name: PvE Roll

data.description: This bow has kill clip. Nuff said. Pair that with rapid hit and you will be a monster. Chaining kills. Drawtime low as you can, masterwork and all
data.name: PvP

data.description: This bow has kill clip. Nuff said. Pair that with rapid hit and you will be a monster. Chaining kills. Drawtime low as you can, masterwork and all
data.name: PvP

data.description: Blinding autoloading is the play here like so many before it.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Blinding autoloading farmer. Go for your personal choices in the other columns.
data.name: pve

data.description: PvP focused rocket. Impulse or snapshot for fast firing rockets. cluster or even incandescent is a nice pvp touch.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Iron reach rangefinder is what you're really looking for.
Decent test perk combo in pvp for quickness.
data.name: pvp niche

data.description: PvP last col perks. Farm for barrel and mag/ammo. Range is king.
data.name: pvp

data.description: #Boss roll
data.name: pve boss option

data.description: PvP roll options. Pick your favorites
data.name: pvp option

data.description: #Boss dps option.
data.name: Pve boss dps option

data.description: #NadeNation
PvE Melee dream shotty here. Finally a pugilist option with one-two punch.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Melee build. Go from here!
data.name: pve

data.description: Very similar in feel to the Krait, but now an Energy weapon. For PvE you'll really only be looking for subsistence in the third column with volt shot. The extra damage is great with Arc 3.0.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Being rapid fire you really need to keep your shots tight. Stability to help with that but first and foremost range. Masterwork range.
data.name: PvP

data.description: You'll really want to try out kill clip to get amazing forgiveness and TTK drops. You'll hit max range on this pretty quick as its got amazing base range. Either barrel or rounds with range are great here. Masterwork Range.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Demo/Adrenaline is always a great grenade build combo. If you aren't focusing on grenades then Kill clip is ok for PvE low activities. For higher end content you'll likely want forth times the charm to get longer mags with perhaps the new perk target lock to get a damage bump more easily for champs.
Seraph rounds are the most unique and arguably best second col here. Any damage perk will do you fine. Choose third col of preference but only pugilist if you are a melee builder. Maybe a Titan?
data.name: PvE

data.description: Good addition to the stasis slot for fusions. Even so, its going to be heavily a PvE weapons with good mag refill perks and utility/damage in last column. Pick your favorite combo but Golden Tricorn could be a nice 50% damage buff if you get a kill and chain a single melee or grenade kill after.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Great, reacquire the dawning weapon now with passive perks added. Same thing as the old, the subsistence reservoir is nasty in PvE chain kills. Other options for damage with golden tricorn now that it was reworked to be much better.
data.name: PvE

data.description: For PvP high impacts were always slow for me but this is probably one of the better ones with the damage perks in the last column. I'm personally hoping to get a double roll that fits a pve and pvp style
data.name: PvP

data.description: Finally since memory interdict we have another similar frame and it rolls impulse for PvP fast nade shots.
data.name: PvP

data.description: I don't see myself bring this over many other heavies, but blinding auto-loading is nice to have I guess.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Nice to have PvE I guess. Many better heavies
data.name: PvE

data.description: Flex this thing. Good fast grenade launcher for PvP
data.name: PvP

data.description: Hey look another auto loading blinder. This is better thanks to the tex passive however, so time to replace your other one... Also nice hot swapper for pvp cleanup strats.
data.name: PvE/PvP

data.description: Good 140 roll here for use.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Nice roll for PvP. Kill clip probably easier to proc in trials but your choice.
Hard to get a bad roll on this. Probably one of the best 140s thanks to the speed boost with lightweight perk.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Replace your old one now that we have the passive.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Replace your old one. Mostly PvE focused gun here. Big note is the new incandesant which is always fantastic with solar builds.
Decent roll for a LMG in pvp, but going to be tough to control.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Killing tally subsistence is the chase for this PvE machine gun
data.name: PvE

data.description: Pretty stable roll for PvP if you use LMGs in pvp
data.name: PvP

data.description: Get the biggest mag with subsistence killing tally you can find
data.name: PvE

data.description: Nice adept LMG for pvp if you use those
data.name: PvP

data.description: Kill clip and perpetual on a scout is nice. Richochet rounds probably next best but high cal is not bad either. Maximize your stability because scouts generally don't need range outside of gambit in PvP
data.name: PvP

data.description: Not sure where to land on this one yet. So many other rockets before it and the passives don't really help rockets much. This one is a budget Hot Head
data.name: PvE

data.description: Its back to grind again, only this time replaces your old one because passive perks... Have fun!
data.name: PvE

data.description: Nice scout useful for adept mods.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Better scouts out there but it is a fun space cowboy fantasy.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Decent PvP roll. Could prime under pressure/high impact thanks to it reloading two at a time, but it has great hip fire options for a scout.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Handling beats out FILO, so go for range and your choice for a nice pvp slugger. It also takes top spot over sojurner's tale finally, so worth picking up. Iron reach can over cap your range so only use that perk if you got no range barrel/rounds
data.name: PvP New top dog

data.description: Pug Swash is fun for pvp and pve but kill clip can also be a nice easy pvp damage perk. Very stable give it a shot.
data.name: PvP/PvE

data.description: Hip fire a aggressive side arm? Yup. Desperado... WTF??? Yea sign me up.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Doesn't out-stat occulted finality but you are looking at a pretty strictly better frozen orbit.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Fun arc sniper for boss DPS
data.name: PvE

data.description: Hey its funnel web but stasis! Same trusted roll as funnel web but we have headstone if you want to lean in on the stasis builds. Also additional damage perks in one for all and multi-kill clip and target lock. You either want to get an extended mag with subsistence/forth times the charm and never reload, or kill stuff and get feeding frenzy/outlaw and reload wicked fast. Also a nice melee combo in grave robber/pugilist
data.name: PvE

data.description: Good Speed of projectile making it vest PvP grenade launcher you can get currently in the game as of lightfall. MW: Velocity
data.name: pvp

data.description: Good Velocity making it best pvp grenade launcher as of lightfall. MW: Velocity
data.name: PvP

data.description: Best Stats for Agg. frame SMG in kinetic slot. MW: Range
data.name: PvP

data.description: Best Stats for Agg. frame SMG in kinetic slot. MW: Range
data.name: PvP

data.description: Demolitionist is unique to this rocket. Making it best DPS for warlock fusion grenade builds. Otherwise, demo is a beast for instant reloads.
data.name: PvE

data.description: If you don't have a piece of mind, this thing will be great in PvP. Perpetual motion/Moving target, IS the god roll piece of mind, but this can be better. PoM didn't have damage perks. This has them in spades. Personally Rampage is the easiest to proc. MW: Range
data.name: PvP
